title: Reversible L Shaped Desk with Storage, Corner Computer Desk with 2 Adjustable Storage Shelves & Monitor Stand, 45 Inches Small Desk Writing Desk, Home Office Desks for Bedroom Living Room, White
description: Ideal for Work From Home & Comfortable Experience 1. A small 44-inch computer desk meets your needs for various locations. 2. Convertible design, you can install left or right. 3. 176 LBS has actual load-bearing capacity to meet various needs.. 4. Double adjustable storage shelves and side fabric bag provide you with multiple storage spaces. 5. The heightened monitor stand helps you relax your neck and back and maintain a correct posture. 6. V-shaped reinforcing bars make the desk frame stronger. 7. Adjustable foot pads keep the desk balanced and prevent scratches on the floor. NOTE 1. Please read the instructions carefully before using and installing the product. 2. Always place the product on a flat, and stable surface. 3. Before using this product, the product must be inspected. If thereis any missing parts or damaged area, please contact us.
